achievements.name: Precision Paddler
achievements.description: Win a single match with a perfect score, never missing a shot.

achievements.name: Flawless Victory
achievements.description: Win a single match without letting your opponent score a single point.

achievements.name: Speed Demon
achievements.description: Win a match with a point scored within the first 10 seconds of each game.
